entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023
